RESUMO Apresenta-se nesta dissertação um conjunto de estudos analíticos e extensa cobertura de simulação numérica sobre a con vecção natural em cavidades. ABSTRACT The present dissertation reports a set of analytical stu dies and extensive coverage by numerical simulation on natural convection ocurring in enclosures. The focus is on convection pro ¡noted by the combination of buoyancy effects due to both tempera tore an concentrat ion variations. The phenomenon is examined for the vertical configurations: the heat and mass transfer occur in the hori sontal di rec tion while the gradients are applied at the cud vertical walls of a rectangular geometry. Both porous and non-porous configu rat.ions care considered. Scale analysis and a Os con linearized solution are the analytical techniques used. The problem is investigated fox' different boundary conditions and the numerical experiments are extended to the domains not covered, by the analytical branch.
